website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for a canine multi-vitamin that works for dogs of any age. Includes key nutrients.
pros: Adds calcium for bone health and multiple vitamins for health of nervous system, coat, and skin
Has a liver flavor that many dogs will eat willingly
Tablets are manufactured in the United States for maximum quality
cons: Hard vitamin tablets that some dogs won't like
Some dogs do not like the taste of these tablets

customer_reviews.title: Plus is not a plus for us
customer_reviews.text: I had been giving my corgis the adult vitamin for a couple years. No problems. This time I ordered the "plus". Both dogs eat them and both dogs throw it up an hour later. I don't exactly know what the difference is, but I am now hesitant to reorder the "adult", thinking formulation may have changed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't eat them
customer_reviews.text: We had to put these inside a pill pocket to get our dogs to eat them. Had to switch brands because it was too costly to buy these and the pill pockets, now I have a half full container wasted. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwins

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the taste
customer_reviews.text: My dog actually thinks they are a treat. He has one every morning with not complaints. Simple for him to take and effective on his health.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my vitamin of choice with my 2 boys! They're on a home diet and I give them this to help cover their nutritional needs as well as 2 other supplements. So far they're doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E.

customer_reviews.title: They are too big for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Hard and too large for my dog. Our dog has no interest in eating these. They are too big to give like medicine.
customer_reviews.author: LM.

customer_reviews.title: Watching
customer_reviews.text: They like them and take them with no problems. Watching to see if they assist with health.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins for the price
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these vitamins. I make my own dog food and needed a supplement for my dog. I was worried she wouldn't like the taste of these but she takes them like treats.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Zalace

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal versus the ones in the store... More for less
customer_reviews.author: T j

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I give this vitamin to all my dogs. Its the only one they find palatable and i love the effectiveness of how they look and feel
customer_reviews.author: Trina DeWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! I just wish the tablets were not so hard as older dogs or those with impaired Dental functions may have trouble chewing them.
customer_reviews.author: CavalierMom

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs do seem to have more energy since being on these vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Seemed to make a big difference in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Seemed to make a big difference in both of my dogs!
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Got my dog very sick!
customer_reviews.text: My dog started to get really bad inflammation due to it! She likes the taste but it got her so sick! Half a grant and two weeks of bland diet later, try them again and booom! Back to being up all night! Please be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Sornette

product_meta.title: Nutri-Vet Multi-Vite Chewables for Dogs | Formulated with Vitamins & Minerals to Support Balanced Diet | 180 Count
product_meta.description: Nutri-Vet Multi-Vite Plus chewables for dogs with calcium provide a wide spectrum of vitamins and minerals that complements a dog’s normal diet. Tasty liver flavor chewables make it easy to promote health and vitality.
feature_bullets: These highly palatable liver-flavored tablets make the perfect complement to your dog’s normal diet by ensuring that he gets all the essential nutrients he needs, including calcium for strong teeth and bones.
B-complex vitamins support the health of the nervous system, skin, hair, liver, muscle & brain
